allow:
Bash("C:/Users/mkocak/Desktop/projects/imar-kanban-v2/backend-nest/.env" << 'EOF'
# Database
DATABASE_URL="postgresql://imar:imar123@localhost:5432/imar_kanban?schema=public"

# Server
PORT=3001
NODE_ENV=development

# JWT
JWT_SECRET=imar-super-secret-key-change-in-production
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=72h

# CORS
CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:3000

# LDAP \(false = use local username/password auth\)
LDAP_ENABLED=false
LDAP_HOST=ldap://your-ldap-server:389
LDAP_BASE_DN=dc=imar,dc=local
LDAP_BIND_DN=cn=service-account,dc=imar,dc=local
LDAP_BIND_PASSWORD=your-ldap-password
LDAP_USER_FILTER=\(sAMAccountName={{username}}\)
LDAP_USER_SEARCH_BASE=
LDAP_GROUP_ADMIN=CN=KanbanAdmins,OU=Groups,DC=imar,DC=local
LDAP_GROUP_MEMBER=
LDAP_SYNC_CRON=0 2 * * *

# Uploads
UPLOAD_DIR=./uploads
UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE_MB=20
EOF)
Bash(docker exec imar-kanban-backend sh -c "cd /app && ls node_modules | grep ts-node")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$content = @''
import { useState, useEffect } from ''react'';
import { useParams, useNavigate } from ''react-router-dom'';
import {
  Input,
  Button,
  Select,
  Switch,
  Avatar,
  Tooltip,
  message,
  Spin,
  Popconfirm,
} from ''antd'';
''@
$content | Out-File -FilePath ''C:\\Users\\mkocak\\Desktop\\projects\\imar-kanban-v2\\frontend\\src\\pages\\settings\\ProjectSettingsPage.tsx'' -Encoding UTF8 -Force
Write-Host ''Partial write ok''
")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "
$path = ''C:\\Users\\mkocak\\Desktop\\projects\\imar-kanban-v2\\frontend\\src\\pages\\settings\\ProjectSettingsPage.tsx''
$lines = @\(\)
$lines += ""import { useState, useEffect } from ''react'';""
$lines += ""import { useParams, useNavigate } from ''react-router-dom'';""
$lines | Out-File -FilePath $path -Encoding UTF8 -Force
Write-Host ''Test write:'' \(Get-Item $path\).Length ''bytes''
")
